name: Horrific Dreamer
description:
You wake up in a bad lucid dream, your goal is to find keys and escape your dream. 

A short replayable horror game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

[ESC] = Pause game

[E] = Interact

[WASD] = Movement

[LShift] = Sprint

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Extra:

Your progress will be saved in-game. You can always see your progress in the stats menu!

We are in the first year of game development and this is our first game made together.

Diëgo Mulder: Scripting and menu designer.

Imre Zwiers: Map designer.

Erik Burema: Death and menu animations.

 If you would like to support us you can donate any amount for future projects. :)
